title: Second Law Thermo - Entropy Change closed system

content.question:
A system consists of a cylinder of compressed gas connected by a hose to a bottle containing a sample of the same ideal gas, as shown. The gas, bottle, hose and cylinder are initially at the same temperature and are thermally insulated from their surroundings. When the valve on the cylinder is opened, gas moves from the cylinder, through the hose, and into the bottle.
